entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
